name: Walters Nightmares
description:
This game is about Walter. A man with a big moustache. In his dreams he has to fight against the death. He needs to wake up fast or he will get lost in his nightmares. 

Can you beat the 15th level and find the keys to his freedom? 

This game uses your real world-time. If you play in night everything will be dark and you need to use your flashlight.
